text: ninnal (tal‌varayil madinayeat‌) atutta bhagattum, avar akanna bhagattum, sart'thavahakasangham ninnalekkal taleyumayirunna sandarbham (orkkuka.) ninnal an'yean'yam (pearin‌) niscayiccirunnuvenkil ninnal a niscayam niraverrunnatil bhinnikkumayirunnu. pakse untakenta oru karyam allahu nirvahikkunnatin ventiyayirunnu at‌. atayat nasiccavar vyaktamaya teliv kantukeant nasikkanum, jiviccavar vyaktamaya teliv kant keant jivikkuvanum venti. tirccayayum allahu ellam kelkkunnavanum ariyunnavanumakunnu
